scene_description_enriched: An angel, with large red and orange wings and a golden halo, is depicted placing a hand on the shoulder of a kneeling woman. The woman, wearing a blue gown and a white hennin, has her hands clasped in prayer over an open book resting on a richly decorated lectern. The background features architectural elements, including a green wall with a window and a patterned wall, suggesting an interior setting. A scroll with Latin text, "Ave Maria, gratia plena, Dominus tecum," is held by the angel, further identifying the scene.
